Function reference

Modules

Pairs of shiny module and servers that are building block for interactive shiny network app.

UI building block

Parse graph editing command list into bs4Dash UI components.

log_timeline_item()
log_timeline_item

Utility Function

Paste node attributes into tooltip; Parse expression and find matching node id; Take a command list and use it to modify igraph object.
